parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It focuses on the promotion of 23 police officers in Botoșani, Romania, on the occasion of Romania's National Day.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook post, published on a public platform, and addresses the general public in Botoșani and surrounding areas, as evidenced by the targeting data in the `aaa_info` section.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to inform the public about the promotion of police officers, not to influence the vote for any candidate in the parliamentary elections.  The content is celebratory and related to a local event, unrelated to the electoral process.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of local news reporting, similar to citizen journalism, informing the public about a local event. It presents factual information without any apparent bias or attempt to influence the vote.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>624919246526051</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post focuses on the promotion of police officers in Botoșani, Romania.  It does not mention any parliamentary candidates or parties, nor does it attempt to influence voters. The content is purely informational and celebratory, relating to a local event unrelated to the electoral process. The targeting data shows a focus on Botoșani County and surrounding areas, but this is geographically-based targeting, not politically-motivated.  While the post is categorized as "POLITICAL" due to the advertiser's self-identification, the content itself lacks any elements of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea - Botosani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
